title: Evergreen Laurel Hotel apologizes for not flying Chinese flag – Little Pink targeted – Mirror Media
text:
2024.08.15 18:31 Taipei time
internationalization
The Evergreen Laurel Hotel apologized after being targeted by Little Pink for not flying the Chinese flag. (Reproduced from the official website of the Evergreen Laurel Hotel) Release time: 2024.08.15 18:31 Taipei Time
Update time: 2024.08.15 18:31 Taipei Time
art Evergreen Laurel Little Pink CCP Hotel Chinese Internet celebrity “Instructor Zhang’s Interesting Life” originally planned to stay at the Evergreen Laurel Hotel in Paris, France last weekend, but was dissatisfied that Wan’s national flag was hanging in the hotel but the Chinese flag Director Zhang was very dissatisfied and kicked out of the hotel several times. Today, the official website of “Evergreen Laurel Hotel (Shanghai)” issued an apology statement, saying that they “do not want this matter to affect the feelings of people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait.” “
The apology is currently only published on the official website of “Evergreen Laurel Hotel (Shanghai)” and is written in simplified Chinese. It says: “In response to the concerns raised by some of the -guests express the style of the Evergreen Hotel Paris Laurel at the Olympics, this hotel has always maintained the spirit of customer service first and is committed to providing an experience a perfect accommodation for every guest However, the hotel’s handling of this event was not thoughtful enough, which caused bad feelings for some residents and concerns from all walks of life.
“The hotel does not want this case to affect the feelings of people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait. The Chairman of Evergreen Group, Mr. Zhang Rongfa was also committed to promoting cross-strait economic and trade cooperation during his lifetime, and he spared no effort. to integrate the organization’s physical resources to give back to society. Evergreen Laurel Hotels has always adhered to President Zhang’s philosophy. The Evergreen Laurel Hotel will continue to improve in the future and hope to provide better services so that every guest can enjoy a more perfect accommodation experience.”
This apology is currently only published on the official website of “Evergreen Laurel Hotel (Shanghai)”. (Reproduced from the official website of the Evergreen Laurel Hotel)
